summary: Fixes a bug that allows certain helmets to be worn with dragon priest masks and circlets.
descriptionHtml:
This mod\'s functionality (and then some) can be found in Headbomb\'s [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4719]Weapons and Armor fixes[/url]. It already contains all the helmets I had planned to address in version 1.2, plus more, so get it from him instead.

This mod is discontinued and I will likely delete this page after users have had time to phase over to Headbomb\'s instead.
author: ZeroTorrent
